Gosu C++ Documentation

These pages serve as a reference on the C++ interface of Gosu. For a higher-level discussion of concepts and ideas behind the library, see the Wiki entries linked from the official website, http://www.libgosu.org/.

Documentation not clear enough? Please go to one of the places listed on http://www.libgosu.org/ and leave feedback. Thanks!
